5-4-3-2-1 Cymru Cycle Challenge

Between Friday 23rd May and Tuesday 27th May 2014, I was part of a 180 mile + cycle challenge from Netherlands to Belgium for Luca and St David’s Hospice.

Jul 7, 2014

Bath Half Marathon

On Sunday 3rd March 2013, I ran Bath half marathon in aid of Leukaemia and Lymphoma Research. I raised £335.00 with an extra £75.00 from gift aid.

Jul 4, 2013

Alzheimer's Bristol Cycle Challenge

On September 25th 2011, I completed an eighty five mile cycle in aid of Alzheimer’s and raised a total of £272.00. Thanks again to those who sponsored me.

Jun 9, 2013
